mapper.select: SELECT TYPE as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM WL GROUP BY TYPE

SELECT F.MONTH, F.ID, F.NUM, W.NAME FROM WL W, ( SELECT to_char(INPUT_DATE, 'mm') AS MONTH, ID, SUM(NUM) AS NUM FROM FINISHED_PRODUCT WHERE
INPUT_DATE >= to_date( to_char(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and INPUT_DATE < to_date(to_char(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY to_char(INPUT_DATE, 'mm'), ID ) F WHERE W.ID = F.ID
SELECT COUNT(*) as value, G.GYS as name FROM WL W, GYS G WHERE W.GYSID = G.GYSID AND GYS != 'æ— ' GROUP BY G.GYS

SELECT A.ID as ID, W.NAME as NAME, A.NUM as NUM FROM (SELECT ID AS ID,SUM(NUM) as NUM FROM FINISHED_PRODUCT WHERE
INPUT_DATE >= to_date( to_char(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and INPUT_DATE < to_date(to_char(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY ID) A,WL W WHERE A.ID = W.ID

SELECT ID AS ID, SUM( NUM ) AS NUM, to_char( INPUT_DATE, 'mm' ) AS MONTH FROM FINISHED_PRODUCT WHERE
INPUT_DATE >= to_date( to_char(#{startDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
and INPUT_DATE < to_date(to_char(#{endDate},'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd')
GROUP BY to_char( INPUT_DATE, 'mm' ), ID
